About Me

I am a Data Scientist who is passionate about data analytics especially when it relates to human behaviour data in the context of health, social networks, and languages. I bring experience and curiosity from my background in Mechanical Engineering and Software Engineering.

Projects

Graphs & Networks Exploration

Data From "The International Consortium of Investigative Journalists" Offshore Leaks Database

In this project I got a chance to explore the real network of Offshore Leaks. I observed that the data followed the Preferential Attachment Model when I studied the in-degree & out-degrees.

Subreddit Classification - NLP

Data was gathered from Meditation and Yoga Subreddits

In this project, I used natural language processing to classify texts extracted from Yoga and Meditation subreddits.

September 2024 to June 2025

  • Stock Market News Sentiment Analysis and Summarization (NLP):

  • Bank Customer Churn Prediction (Neural Networks):
    • Developed an artificial neural network from scratch to identify high-risk churn customers using TensorFlow, and Keras.
  • Credit Card User Churn Prediction (ML):
    • Built a predictive model to classify churn behavior using Random Forest, Bagging, Boosting, SMOTE, and hyperparameter tuning.
  • Personal Loan Campaign (ML):
    • Analyzed customer attributes and built a decision tree model to predict loan acquisition likelihood and guide marketing strategies.
  • FoodHub:
    • Performed EDA using NumPy, Pandas, and Seaborn to uncover demand patterns in cuisines and restaurants, and provided business recommendations.
